description: Manifesto: The style of my art visualizes the sensation of the brain while it sees something completely unfamiliar, strange and tries to identify it.  My art freeze this feeling and shows the beauty aesthetics of this it. "Because when we face the unknown, we expand the boundaries of our consciousness." Maybe for you it will remind you of the relics of "Other Gods" from the books of Lovecraft, maybe it looks like your machine elves, or maybe it is a souvenir from a vacation in the multiverse.
